title: Lion King’s Adopted Son - Novel Updates
tags: Animal Characteristics   Beastkin   Beasts   Character Growth   Cultivation   Cute Protagonist   Doting Parents   First Love   Human Experimentation   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Older Love Interests   Power Couple   Shapeshifters   Shota   Slow Romance   Strong Love Interests   Weak to Strong
author: Yan Yang   晏央
description:
It’s said that a male lion would not be polite when they encounters a cub who is not their child. Gerald met such a male lion.

He regards himself as a grain reserve, but he dislikes that he is not enough to stuff his teeth, ready to fatten up before eating.

Gerald decided to grow up under the care of his adoptive father, and then escaped before his adoptive father starts his move.

But who knows, this fattening, it’s not that fattening?>
